sentences.en: A corporation is separate legal entity Chartered by the state.
sentences.cn: 股份有限公司是州政特许的独立的法律主体.

sentences.en: A Piper Cub was chartered to fly.
sentences.cn: 人们采用了派厄泼克勃型飞机飞行.

sentences.en: Cardinal de Bricassart chartered a private plane to Athens.
sentences.cn: 德?布里卡撒特红衣大主教获得特许乘坐一架私人飞机去雅典.

sentences.en: Chartered Institution of Water and Environmental Management ( Hong Kong Branch )
sentences.cn: 水务及环境管理学会 ( 香港分会 )

sentences.en: Generally speaking, the business stakeholders who chartered and funded the project should announce changes in the external business environment to the project team.
sentences.cn: 总体来说，那些特许的和投资的商业涉众应该向项目团队来宣布在外部商业环境中的变更。

sentences.en: He chartered a jet to fly her home from California to Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 他包了架喷气式飞机把她从加利福尼亚送回瑞士家里。

sentences.en: He left immediately for the airport, and chartered a jet.
sentences.cn: 他立即赶往机场, 租用了一架喷气式飞机.

sentences.en: Membership of appropriate professional organisation ( e . g . Association of Chartered Certified Accountants ).
sentences.cn: 适当的专业组织的会员 ( 例如特准的注册会计的协会 ).

sentences.en: Our school chartered three buses for the trip.
sentences.cn: 我们学校为那次旅行包了三辆公共汽车.

sentences.en: She belongs to the Chartered Institute of Management.
sentences.cn: 她属于英国特许管理协会.

sentences.en: The entire force would assemble downtown and be conveyed to Brookside by chartered bus.
sentences.cn: 所有人员将在市内集合,乘专车前往布鲁克赛德.

sentences.en: The government chartered a new bank in the capital.
sentences.cn: 政府特许在首都建立一家新银行。

sentences.en: The members of the club chartered a plane to take them on holiday to France.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部会员包租了一架飞机运他们去法国度假.

sentences.en: The same year the university of Wisconsin was chartered.
sentences.cn: 同年,威斯康星大学成立.

sentences.en: The university was chartered under the authority of the Ministry of Science.
sentences.cn: 这所大学是科技部特许设立的.

sentences.en: They chartered a bus for the trip.
sentences.cn: 为这次旅行他们租了一部巴士.

words.tran_cn: 特许；包租；发给特许执照

phrases.tran_cn: 注册会计师；会计师；特许会计师
（英国）渣打银行；（英国）渣打集团有限公司

trans.tran_en: an  accountant  ,  surveyor  etc who has successfully completed special examinations

trans.tran_cn: 发给…许可证(charter的过去分词)
